To find the best-rated late-night Korean restaurant in Champaign, IL that opens beyond 9 PM, I can use Google Maps. The app is available on the home screen. I will search for "late-night Korean restaurants in Champaign, IL" and filter the results to show only those open after 9 PM. Then, I will sort the results by rating to identify the best-rated restaurant.

### Plan ###
1. Open the Google Maps app.
2. Search for "late-night Korean restaurants in Champaign, IL."
3. Apply a filter to show only restaurants open after 9 PM.
4. Sort the results by rating to find the best-rated restaurant.
5. Note the name and details of the best-rated restaurant.

### Current Subgoal ###
Open the Google Maps app.

- Back(): Return to the previous state.
